movie.title: I, Tonya
movie.plot: Competitive ice skater Tonya Harding rises amongst the ranks at the U. S. Figure Skating Championships, but her future in the sport is thrown into doubt when her ex-husband intervenes.

events.title: Tonya Harding lands a triple axle at the nationals
Tonya Harding places fourth in the Winter Olympics
ice skater Nancy Kerrigan is attacked and injured by Shane Stant
